title: The Fake Saint Decided to be Real - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Healers   Knights   Magic   Misunderstandings   Saints   Second Chance
author: Dream Altelier   드림아뜰리에
description:
'For me, she is the only real Saint!'

A holy knight, Astein, whom the Saint shouldn't give her heart to.
He lost his life trying to protect me as a fake Saint. God must have felt sorry for him so He gave me a chance like a miracle.

'Then if I survive, please leave Lady Freya's day to me.'

For my unchangingly kind knight, I decided to be the real Saint.
>
